text: Loot is a 1970 British crime comedy movie directed by Silvio Narizzano and based on the Joe Orton play of the same name. It stars Richard Attenborough, Lee Remick, Hywel Bennett, Milo O'Shea, Roy Holder, Dick Emery, Aubrey Woods, Harold Innocent and Stephen Yardley. ==Other websites== * Category:1970 comedy movies Category:1970 crime movies Category:1970s criminal comedy movies Category:British criminal comedy movies Category:British plays adapted into movies Category:Movies directed by Silvio Narizzano
title: Loot (1970 movie)
